name: Humilation: The Game
description:
Pssst. Hey kid! Its your conscience. I think it would be really funny if you try and see how many people you can spray with that squirt gun before your dad gets back! If you spray their pants it'll look like they peed their pants, and they'd get SO embarrassed! Give it a go!
 Controls

WASD - Move

LMB - Spray

ESC - Pause/Unpause

best enjoyed with the sound/music
